message.content:
Explore the user's home directory (/home/esegnorelli) to find all configuration files related to:
- kitty terminal (kitty.conf, themes)
- zsh shell (.zshrc, .zprofile)
- starship prompt (.config/starship.toml)
- tmux (.tmux.conf, .tmux/)
- neovim/lazyvim (.config/nvim/)

List all relevant configuration files found and their current state. Focus on finding:
1. Existing kitty configuration
2. Zsh configuration with starship integration
3. Tmux configuration with plugins
4. Neovim/LazyVim setup

Return a comprehensive list of all config files found with brief descriptions of what each contains.

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ± Kitty Terminal Configuration - Catppuccin Mocha Theme
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Fontes
font_family FiraCode Nerd Font
bold_font FiraCode Nerd Font Bold
italic_font FiraCode Nerd Font Italic
bold_italic_font FiraCode Nerd Font Bold Italic
font_size 12.0

# Ligaduras e Cursor
disable_ligatures never
cursor_shape block
cursor_blink_interval 0.5
cursor_beam_thickness 1.5
cursor_underline_thickness 1.5

# Cursor Trail Effect
cursor_trail_step 0.5
cursor_trail_decay 0.1 0.4

# Scrollback
scrollback_lines 10000
scrollback_pager less --chop-long-lines --RAW-CONTROL-CHARS +INPUT_LINE_NUMBER

# Layouts
enabled_layouts tall:bias=70;fat:bias=70;grid;stack;split

# Tab Bar
tab_bar_edge bottom
tab_bar_style powerline
tab_powerline_style slanted
tab_title_template "{index}:{fmt.bold}{title}"
active_tab_font_style bold
inactive_tab_font_style normal

# Background & Opacity
background_opacity 0.90
dynamic_background_opacity yes

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ¨ Catppuccin Mocha Color Palette
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

foreground #cdd6f4
background #1e1e2e

cursor #f5e0dc
cursor_text_color #1e1e2e

selection_foreground #1e1e2e
selection_background #cba6f7

url_style #89b4fa

# ANSI Colors
color0  #45475a
color1  #f38ba8
color2  #a6e3a1
color3  #f9e2af
color4  #89b4fa
color5  #f5c2e7
color6  #94e2d5
color7  #cdd6f4

# Bright Colors
color8  #585b70
color9  #f38ba8
color10 #a6e3a1
color11 #f9e2af
color12 #89b4fa
color13 #f5c2e7
color14 #94e2d5
color15 #bac2de

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ–¼ï¸ Window & Borders

window_margin_width 8
window_padding_width 8
window_border_width 2
draw_minimal_borders yes

active_border_color #cba6f7
inactive_border_color #45475a
bell_border_color #f38ba8

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Modifiers
kitty_mod ctrl+shift

# Splits
map kitty_mod+v split_window --vertical
map kitty_mod+s split_window --horizontal

# Layouts
map kitty_mod+next_layout next_layout

# Resize
map kitty_mod+> change_font_size all +2.0
map kitty_mod+< change_font_size all -2.0
map kitty_mod+f change_font_size all 0
map kitty_mod+equal change_font_size all 0

# Scroll
map kitty_mod+up scroll_line_up
map kitty_mod+down scroll_line_down
map kitty_mod+page_up scroll_page_up
map kitty_mod+page_down scroll_page_down
map kitty_mod+home scroll_home
map kitty_mod+end scroll_end

# Navigation
map kitty_mod+[ next_tab
map kitty_mod+] previous_tab
map kitty_mod+t new_tab
map kitty_mod+w close_tab
map kitty_mod+f launch --location=hsplit
map kitty_mod+b launch --location=vsplit

# Copy/Paste
map kitty_mod+c copy_to_clipboard
map kitty_mod+v paste_from_clipboard
map kitty_mod+s show_scrollback

# Misc
map kitty_mod+enter new_window
map kitty_mod+n close_window
map kitty_mod+l next_window
map kitty_mod+h previous_window
map kitty_mod+e kitten hints

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

enable_audio_bell no

mouse_hide_wait 3.0
focus_follows_mouse no
sync_to_monitor yes

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

   371â†’# ğŸ“ Useful Functions

   373â†’
   374â†’# Create directory and enter it

   379â†’# Extract any archive
   380â†’extract() {
   381â†’    if [ -f "$1" ]; then
   382â†’        case "$1" in
   383â†’            *.tar.bz2)   tar xjf "$1"   ;;
   384â†’            *.tar.gz)    tar xzf "$1"   ;;
   385â†’            *.bz2)       bunzip2 "$1"   ;;
   386â†’            *.rar)       unrar x "$1"   ;;
   387â†’            *.gz)        gunzip "$1"    ;;
   388â†’            *.tar)       tar xf "$1"    ;;
   389â†’            *.tbz2)      tar xjf "$1"   ;;
   390â†’            *.tgz)       tar xzf "$1"   ;;
   391â†’            *.zip)       unzip "$1"     ;;
   392â†’            *.Z)         uncompress "$1";;
   393â†’            *.7z)        7z x "$1"      ;;
   394â†’            *)           echo "'$1' cannot be extracted via extract()" ;;
   395â†’        esac
   396â†’    else
   397â†’        echo "'$1' is not a valid file"
   398â†’    fi
   399â†’}
   400â†’
   401â†’# Git branch fuzzy search
   402â†’gbr() {

   405â†’
   406â†’# Search git commits and show details
   407â†’glof() {
   408â†’    git log --all --oneline --graph | fzf --preview 'echo {} | grep -o "[a-f0-9]\{7\}" | xargs -I % git show --stat %'
   409â†’}
   410â†’

   447â†’# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
   448â†’# ğŸ¨ Colors
   449â†’# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
   450â†’
   451â†’# Enable colors for various commands
   452â†’export LS_COLORS='di=34:ln=35:so=32:pi=33:ex=31:bd=34;46:cd=34;43:su=30;41:sg=30;46:tw=30;42:ow=30;43'
   453â†’

   455â†’export LESS_TERMCAP_mb=$'\e[1;32m'
   456â†’export LESS_TERMCAP_md=$'\e[1;32m'
   457â†’export LESS_TERMCAP_me=$'\e[0m'
   458â†’export LESS_TERMCAP_se=$'\e[0m'
   459â†’export LESS_TERMCAP_so=$'\e[01;33m'
   460â†’export LESS_TERMCAP_ue=$'\e[0m'
   461â†’export LESS_TERMCAP_us=$'\e[1;4;31m'
   462â†’
   463â†’# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
   464â†’# ğŸ“¦ Tool-specific Configurations

   466â†’

   478â†’# ğŸ¯ Load local configurations

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸš€ Zsh Configuration - Modern & Fast Shell
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ”§ Environment
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

export PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH"
export EDITOR=nvim
export VISUAL=nvim
export PAGER=less
export LESS='-R -F -X'
export MANPAGER="sh -c 'col -bx | bat -l man -p'"

# Language & Locale
export LANG=pt_BR.UTF-8
export LC_ALL=pt_BR.UTF-8

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ¨ Starship Prompt
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

eval "$(starship init zsh)"

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# âŒ¨ï¸ Keybindings
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Vi mode
bindkey -v
export KEYTIMEOUT=1

# Better navigation
bindkey '^L' vi-forward-word
bindkey '^H' vi-backward-word
bindkey '^k' up-line-or-search
bindkey '^j' down-line-or-search
bindkey '^a' beginning-of-line
bindkey '^e' end-of-line
bindkey '^f' forward-char
bindkey '^b' backward-char

# Edit command line in nvim
autoload -U edit-command-line
zle -N edit-command-line
bindkey '^v' edit-command-line

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ” Completion
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

setopt prompt_subst
zstyle ':completion:*' matcher-list 'm:{a-z}={A-Za-z}'
zstyle ':completion:*' list-colors ''
zstyle ':completion:*' menu select
zstyle ':completion:*' group-name ''
zstyle ':completion:*' verbose yes
zstyle ':completion:*:descriptions' format '%F{yellow}%B%d%b%f'
zstyle ':completion:*:warnings' format '%F{red}No matches for:%f %d'
zstyle ':completion:*' accept-exact '*(N)'
zstyle ':completion:*' use-cache on
zstyle ':completion:*' cache-path ~/.zcompcache

autoload bashcompinit && bashcompinit
autoload -Uz compinit
compinit

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ“œ History
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

export HISTSIZE=100000
export SAVEHIST=100000
export HISTCONTROL=ignoredups
setopt HIST_IGNORE_DUPS
setopt HIST_IGNORE_ALL_DUPS
setopt SHARE_HISTORY
setopt HIST_REDUCE_BLANKS
setopt EXTENDED_HISTORY
setopt HIST_FIND_NO_DUPS
setopt HIST_SAVE_NO_DUPS

HISTFILE=~/.zsh_history

# ğŸ“ Useful Functions
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Create directory and enter it
mkcd() {
    mkdir -p "$1" && cd "$1"
}

# Extract any archive
extract() {
    if [ -f "$1" ]; then
        case "$1" in
            *.tar.bz2)   tar xjf "$1"   ;;
            *.tar.gz)    tar xzf "$1"   ;;
            *.bz2)       bunzip2 "$1"   ;;
            *.rar)       unrar x "$1"   ;;
            *.gz)        gunzip "$1"    ;;
            *.tar)       tar xf "$1"    ;;
            *.tbz2)      tar xjf "$1"   ;;
            *.tgz)       tar xzf "$1"   ;;
            *.zip)       unzip "$1"     ;;
            *.Z)         uncompress "$1";;
            *.7z)        7z x "$1"      ;;
            *)           echo "'$1' cannot be extracted via extract()" ;;
        esac
    else
        echo "'$1' is not a valid file"
    fi
}

# Git branch fuzzy search
gbr() {
    git branch | fzf | xargs git checkout
}

# Search git commits and show details
glof() {
    git log --all --oneline --graph | fzf --preview 'echo {} | grep -o "[a-f0-9]\{7\}" | xargs -I % git show --stat %'
}

# Kill process fuzzy search
k9() {
    ps aux | fzf | awk '{print $2}' | xargs kill -9
}

# Create a backup
backup() {
    cp "$1" "$1.bak"
}

# Get public IP
myip() {
    curl -s https://api.ipify.org
    echo
}

# Weather report
weather() {
    curl -s "wttr.in/${1:-Sao Paulo}?format=3"
}

# Quick note
note() {
    echo "[$(date +%Y-%m-%d\ %H:%M:%S)] $*" >> ~/notes.txt
}

# Find files by name
ff() {
    find . -type f -iname "*$1*"
}

# Find text in files
ft() {
    grep -rI "$1" .
}

export PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH"

if [[ ! -f ~/.local/share/zinit/zinit.git/zinit.zsh ]]; then
    print -P "%F{33} %F{220}Installing %F{33}ZDHARMA-CONTINUUM%F{220} Initiative Plugin Manager (%F{33}zdharma-continuum/zinit%F{220})â€¦%f"
    command mkdir -p "$HOME/.local/share/zinit" && command chmod g-rwX "$HOME/.local/share/zinit"
    command git clone https://github.com/zdharma-continuum/zinit "$HOME/.local/share/zinit/zinit.git" && \
        print -P "%F{33} %F{34}Installation successful.%f%b" || \
        print -P "%F{160} The clone has failed.%f%b"
fi

source "$HOME/.local/share/zinit/zinit.git/zinit.zsh"
autoload -Uz _zinit
(( ${+_comps} )) && _comps[zinit]=_zinit

zinit ice depth=1
zinit light zdharma-continuum/fast-syntax-highlighting
zinit light zsh-users/zsh-autosuggestions
zinit light zsh-users/zsh-completions
zinit light romkatv/powerlevel10k

[[ ! -f ~/.p10k.zsh ]] || source ~/.p10k.zsh

ZSH_AUTOSUGGEST_HIGHLIGHT_STYLE="fg=#565f89"
ZSH_AUTOSUGGEST_STRATEGY=(history completion)

alias ls='ls --color=auto'
alias grep='grep --color=auto'

alias z.ai='ANTHROPIC_BASE_URL=https://api.z.ai/api/anthropic ANTHROPIC_AUTH_TOKEN=e81d209ce9ff493daaeb6f747de0b44b.u6QnO4jSwaZGaQ6S ANTHROPIC_DEFAULT_HAIKU_MODEL=glm-4.5-air ANTHROPIC_DEFAULT_SONNET_MODEL=glm-4.6 ANTHROPIC_DEFAULT_OPUS_MODEL=glm-4.6 claude'
alias ocrun='opencode run'
alias ocfree='opencode -m opencode/glm-4.7-free'
alias ocglm='opencode -m opencode/glm-4.7-free'
alias occ='opencode --continue'
alias ochelp='cat ~/GUIA-OPENCODE.md'

export HISTSIZE=10000
export SAVEHIST=10000
setopt HIST_IGNORE_DUPS
setopt SHARE_HISTORY
setopt HIST_REDUCE_BLANKS
setopt EXTENDED_HISTORY

HISTFILE=~/.zsh_history

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸš€ Starship Prompt Configuration - Catppuccin Mocha Theme
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

"$schema" = 'https://starship.rs/config-schema.json'

format = """
[î‚¶](red)\
$os\
$username\
[î‚°](bg:peach fg:red)\
$directory\
[î‚°](bg:yellow fg:peach)\
$git_branch\
$git_status\
[î‚°](fg:yellow bg:green)\
$c\
$rust\
$golang\
$nodejs\
$python\
[î‚°](fg:green bg:sapphire)\
$docker_context\
$conda\
[î‚°](fg:sapphire bg:lavender)\
$time\
[î‚´ ](fg:lavender)\
$cmd_duration\
$line_break\
$character"""

palette = 'catppuccin_mocha'

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

[os]
disabled = false
style = "bg:red fg:crust"

[os.symbols]

SUSE = "ïŒ”"
Raspbian = "ó°¿"

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

[username]
show_always = true
style_user = "bg:red fg:crust"

format = '[ $user ]($style)'

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ“ Directory Module
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

[directory]
style = "bg:peach fg:crust"
format = "[ $path ]($style)"
truncation_length = 3
truncation_symbol = "â€¦/"
truncate_to_repo = false

[directory.substitutions]
"Documents" = " ó°ˆ™ "
"Downloads" = " ï€™ "
"Music" = " ó°š "
"Pictures" = " ï€¾ "
"Developer" = " ó°²‹ "
".config" = " î˜— "
"code" = " ó°²‹ "

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ”§ Git Modules
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

[git_branch]
symbol = " ï˜"
style = "bg:yellow"
format = '[[ $symbol $branch ](fg:crust bg:yellow)]($style)'

[git_status]
style = "bg:yellow"
format = '[[($all_status$ahead_behind )](fg:crust bg:yellow)]($style)'
ahead = 'â‡¡'
behind = 'â‡£'
diverged = 'â‡•'
conflicted = '!'
modified = '!'
deleted = 'âœ˜'
renamed = 'Â»'
staged = '+'
untracked = '?'

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ Language Modules
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

[nodejs]
symbol = " îœ˜"
style = "bg:green"
format = '[[ $symbol( $version) ](fg:crust bg:green)]($style)'
detect_extensions = ['js', 'mjs', 'cjs', 'ts']
detect_files = ['package.json', '.node-version', '.nvmrc']
detect_folders = ['node_modules']

[c]
symbol = " î˜"
style = "bg:green"
format = '[[ $symbol( $version) ](fg:crust bg:green)]($style)'
detect_extensions = ['c', 'h', 'cpp']
detect_files = ['CMakeLists.txt', 'Makefile', 'meson.build']

[rust]
symbol = " î¨"
style = "bg:green"
format = '[[ $symbol( $version) ](fg:crust bg:green)]($style)'
detect_extensions = ['rs']
detect_files = ['Cargo.toml']

[golang]
symbol = " î˜§"
style = "bg:green"
format = '[[ $symbol( $version) ](fg:crust bg:green)]($style)'
detect_extensions = ['go']
detect_files = ['go.mod', 'go.sum', 'go.work', 'glide.yaml']

[python]
symbol = " î˜†"
style = "bg:green"
format = '[[ $symbol( $version)(\(#$virtualenv\)) ](fg:crust bg:green)]($style)'
pyenv_version_name = true
python_binary = ['python3', 'python', 'python2']
detect_extensions = ['py']
detect_files = ['.python-version', 'Pipfile', 'tox.ini', 'setup.py', 'requirements.txt', 'pyproject.toml']

[java]
symbol = " î‰–"
style = "bg:green"
format = '[[ $symbol( $version) ](fg:crust bg:green)]($style)'
detect_extensions = ['java', 'class', 'jar', 'gradle', 'clj', 'cljc']
detect_files = ['pom.xml', 'build.gradle', 'settings.gradle']

[kotlin]
symbol = " î˜´"
style = "bg:green"
format = '[[ $symbol( $version) ](fg:crust bg:green)]($style)'
detect_extensions = ['kt', 'kts']
detect_files = ['build.gradle.kts', 'build.kts']

[haskell]
symbol = " î˜Ÿ"
style = "bg:green"
format = '[[ $symbol( $version) ](fg:crust bg:green)]($style)'
detect_extensions = ['hs', 'lhs']
detect_files = ['stack.yaml', 'cabal.project', 'package.yaml']

[php]
symbol = " î˜ˆ"
style = "bg:green"
format = '[[ $symbol( $version) ](fg:crust bg:green)]($style)'
detect_extensions = ['php']
detect_files = ['composer.json']

[docker_context]
symbol = " ïŒˆ"
style = "bg:sapphire"
format = '[[ $symbol( $context) ](fg:crust bg:sapphire)]($style)'
detect_files = ['docker-compose.yml', 'docker-compose.yaml', 'Dockerfile']
detect_extensions = ['Dockerfile']

[conda]
symbol = " ï„Œ "
style = "fg:crust bg:sapphire"
format = '[$symbol$environment ]($style)'
ignore_base = false
detect_files = ['environment.yml', 'environment.yaml']

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

local lazypath = vim.fn.stdpath('data') .. '/lazy/lazy.nvim'
if not vim.loop.fs_stat(lazypath) then
  vim.fn.system({
    'git',
    'clone',
    '--filter=blob:none',
    'https://github.com/folke/lazy.nvim.git',
    '--branch=stable',
    lazypath,
  })
end
vim.opt.rtp:prepend(lazypath)

require('lazy').setup({
  -- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

  -- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
  -- ğŸ“Š Status Line (Lualine)

  {
    'nvim-lualine/lualine.nvim',
    event = 'VeryLazy',
    dependencies = { 'nvim-tree/nvim-web-devicons' },
    config = function()
      require('lualine').setup({
        options = {
          theme = 'catppuccin',
          globalstatus = true,
          component_separators = { left = 'â”‚', right = 'â”‚' },
          section_separators = { left = '', right = '' },
          disabled_filetypes = {
            statusline = {},
            winbar = {},
          },
        },
        sections = {
          lualine_a = { 'mode' },
          lualine_b = { 'branch', 'diff', 'diagnostics' },
          lualine_c = {
            {
              'filename',
              path = 1,
              symbols = {
                modified = 'â—',
                readonly = 'ğŸ”’',
                unnamed = '[No Name]',
              },
            },
          },
          lualine_x = {
            {
              'filetype',
              icon_only = true,
              separator = '',
              padding = { left = 1, right = 0 },
            },
            'encoding',
            'fileformat',
          },
          lualine_y = { 'progress' },
          lualine_z = { 'location' },
        },
      })
    end,
  },

  -- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
  -- ğŸ” Fuzzy Finder (Telescope)
  -- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
  {
    'nvim-telescope/telescope.nvim',
    cmd = 'Telescope',
    version = false,
    dependencies = {
      'nvim-lua/plenary.nvim',
      {
        'nvim-telescope/telescope-fzf-native.nvim',
        build = 'make',
      },
    },
    keys = {
      { '<leader>ff', '<cmd>Telescope find_files<cr>', desc = 'Find files' },
      { '<leader>fg', '<cmd>Telescope live_grep<cr>', desc = 'Live grep' },
      { '<leader>fb', '<cmd>Telescope buffers<cr>', desc = 'Buffers' },
      { '<leader>fh', '<cmd>Telescope help_tags<cr>', desc = 'Help tags' },
      { '<leader>fc', '<cmd>Telescope commands<cr>', desc = 'Commands' },
      { '<leader>fr', '<cmd>Telescope oldfiles<cr>', desc = 'Recent files' },
      { '<leader>fs', '<cmd>Telescope grep_string<cr>', desc = 'Grep string' },
    },
    config = function()
      local telescope = require('telescope')
      telescope.setup({
        defaults = {
          prompt_prefix = 'ğŸ” ',
          selection_caret = 'â¯ ',
          path_display = { 'truncate' },
          sorting_strategy = 'ascending',
          layout_config = {
            horizontal = {
              prompt_position = 'top',
              preview_width = 0.55,
            },
            vertical = {
              mirror = false,
            },
          },
        },
      })
      telescope.load_extension('fzf')
    end,
  },

  -- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
  -- ğŸŒ³ Syntax Highlighting (Treesitter)
  -- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
  {
    'nvim-treesitter/nvim-treesitter',
    build = ':TSUpdate',
    event = { 'BufReadPost', 'BufNewFile' },
    config = function()
      require('nvim-treesitter.configs').setup({
        ensure_installed = {
          'bash',
          'c',
          'cpp',
          'html',
          'css',
          'javascript',
          'typescript',
          'tsx',
          'json',
          'lua',
          'luadoc',
          'luap',
          'markdown',
          'markdown_inline',
          'python',
          'query',
          'regex',
          'vim',
          'vimdoc',
          'yaml',
          'go',
          'rust',
          'toml',
        },
        highlight = {
          enable = true,
          disable = function(_, buf)
            local max_filesize = 100 * 1024
            local ok, stats = pcall(vim.loop.fs_stat, vim.api.nvim_buf_get_name(buf))
            if ok and stats and stats.size > max_filesize then
              return true
            end
          end,
        },
        indent = { enable = true },
        autotag = { enable = true },
      })
    end,
  },

  -- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
  -- ğŸ”Œ LSP Configuration
  -- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
  {
    'neovim/nvim-lspconfig',
    event = { 'BufReadPre', 'BufNewFile' },
    dependencies = {
      'williamboman/mason.nvim',
      'williamboman/mason-lspconfig.nvim',
      'hrsh7th/cmp-nvim-lsp',
      'folke/neodev.nvim',
    },
    config = function()
      local lspconfig = require('lspconfig')
      local mason = require('mason')
      local mason_lspconfig = require('mason-lspconfig')

      mason.setup({
        ui = {
          border = 'rounded',
          icons = {
            package_installed = 'âœ“',
            package_pending = 'âœ',
            package_uninstalled = 'âœ—',
          },
        },
      })

      mason_lspconfig.setup({
        ensure_installed = {
          'lua_ls',
          'pyright',
          'ts_ls',
          'rust_analyzer',
          'gopls',
          'html',
          'cssls',
          'jsonls',
          'yamlls',
          'bashls',
        },
        automatic_installation = true,
      })

      local capabilities = vim.lsp.protocol.make_client_capabilities()
      capabilities = require('cmp_nvim_lsp').default_capabilities(capabilities)

      local on_attach = function(client, bufnr)
        local opts = { buffer = bufnr, silent = true }
        vim.keymap.set('n', 'gd', vim.lsp.buf.declaration, opts)
        vim.keymap.set('n', 'gD', vim.lsp.buf.definition, opts)
        vim.keymap.set('n', 'K', vim.lsp.buf.hover, opts)
        vim.keymap.set('n', 'gi', vim.lsp.buf.implementation, opts)
        vim.keymap.set('n', 'gr', vim.lsp.buf.references, opts)
        vim.keymap.set('n', 'gs', vim.lsp.buf.signature_help, opts)
        vim.keymap.set('n', '<leader>rn', vim.lsp.buf.rename, opts)
        vim.keymap.set('n', '<leader>ca', vim.lsp.buf.code_action, opts)
        vim.keymap.set('n', '<leader>f', function()
          vim.lsp.buf.format({ async = true })
        end, opts)
      end

      mason_lspconfig.setup_handlers({
        function(server_name)
          lspconfig[server_name].setup({
            capabilities = capabilities,
            on_attach = on_attach,
          })
        end,
      })

      require('neodev').setup({})
    end,
  },

  -- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
  -- ğŸ’¡ Auto Completion (nvim-cmp)
  -- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
  {
    'hrsh7th/nvim-cmp',
    event = 'InsertEnter',
    dependencies = {
      'hrsh7th/cmp-nvim-lsp',
      'hrsh7th/cmp-path',
      'hrsh7th/cmp-buffer',
      'L3MON4D3/LuaSnip',
      'saadparwaiz1/cmp_luasnip',
      'rafamadriz/friendly-snippets',
    },
    config = function()
      local cmp = require('cmp')
      local luasnip = require('luasnip')

      require('luasnip.loaders.from_vscode').lazy_load()

      cmp.setup({
        snippet = {
          expand = function(args)
            luasnip.lsp_expand(args.body)
          end,
        },
        mapping = cmp.mapping.preset.insert({
          ['<C-b>'] = cmp.mapping.scroll_docs(-4),
          ['<C-f>'] = cmp.mapping.scroll_docs(4),
          ['<C-Space>'] = cmp.mapping.complete(),
          ['<C-e>'] = cmp.mapping.abort(),
          ['<CR>'] = cmp.mapping.confirm({ behavior = cmp.ConfirmBehavior.Replace, select = true }),
          ['<Tab>'] = cmp.mapping(function(fallback)
            if cmp.visible() then
              cmp.select_next_item()
            elseif luasnip.expand_or_jumpable() then
              luasnip.expand_or_jump()
            else
              fallback()
            end
          end, { 'i', 's' }),
          ['<S-Tab>'] = cmp.mapping(function(fallback)
            if cmp.visible() then
              cmp.select_prev_item()
            elseif luasnip.jumpable(-1) then
              luasnip.jump(-1)
            else
              fallback()
            end
          end, { 'i', 's' }),
        }),
        sources = cmp.config.sources({
          { name = 'nvim_lsp' },
          { name = 'luasnip' },
          { name = 'path' },
        }, {
          { name = 'buffer' },
        }),
        formatting = {
          format = function(entry, vim_item)
            vim_item.menu = ({
              nvim_lsp = '[LSP]',
              luasnip = '[Snippet]',
              buffer = '[Buffer]',
              path = '[Path]',
            })[entry.source.name]
            return vim_item
          end,
        },
      })
    end,
  },

  -- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
  -- ğŸ“ File Explorer (nvim-tree)
  -- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
  {
    'nvim-tree/nvim-tree.lua',
    cmd = { 'NvimTreeToggle', 'NvimTreeFocus' },
    dependencies = { 'nvim-tree/nvim-web-devicons' },
    keys = {
      { '<leader>e', '<cmd>NvimTreeToggle<cr>', desc = 'Toggle file tree' },
      { '<leader>E', '<cmd>NvimTreeFocus<cr>', desc = 'Focus file tree' },
    },
    config = function()
      require('nvim-tree').setup({
        disable_netrw = true,
        hijack_netrw = true,
        hijack_cursor = true,
        sync_root_with_cwd = true,
        update_focused_file = {
          enable = true,
          update_root = true,
        },
        view = {
          width = 30,
          side = 'left',
        },
        renderer = {
          root_folder_label = false,
          highlight_opened_files = 'name',
          icons = {
            show = {
              file = true,
              folder = true,
              folder_arrow = true,
              git = true,
            },
          },
        },
        git = {
          enable = true,
          ignore = false,
        },
      })
    end,
  },

  -- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
  -- ğŸŒ¿ Git Integration (gitsigns)
  -- â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
  {
    'lewis6991/gitsigns.nvim',
    event = { 'BufReadPre', 'BufNewFile' },
    config = function()
      require('gitsigns').setup({
        signs = {
          add = { text = 'â”‚' },
          change = { text = 'â”‚' },
          delete = { text = '_' },
          topdelete = { text = 'â€¾' },
          changedelete = { text = '~' },
        },
        on_attach = function(bufnr)
          local gs = package.loaded.gitsigns
          local function map(mode, l, r, opts)
            opts = opts or {}
            opts.buffer = bufnr
            vim.keymap.set(mode, l, r, opts)
          end
          map('n', ']c', function()
            if vim.wo.diff then
              return ']c'
            end
            vim.schedule(function()
              gs.next_hunk()
            end)
            return '<Ignore>'
          end, { expr = true })

          map('n', '[c', function()
            if vim.wo.diff then
              return '[c'
            end
            vim.schedule(function()
              gs.prev_hunk()
            end)
            return '<Ignore>'
          end, { expr = true })
        end,
      })
    end,
  },
